title: Euro Trip
description: Travel across Europe through art! Visit 3 masterpieces from different European countries and experience the diversity of European artistic traditions. From British armor to Roman bronzes to Austrian stained glass.

title: Time Warp
description: Journey through the centuries! Discover how art evolved by visiting artworks from 3 different time periods. From ancient Rome (27 BCE-14 CE) to classical Greece (350-325 BCE) to Safavid Persia (1630 CE).

title: Face to Face
description: Discover the evolution of portraiture across 3 distinct artistic styles. From Van Gogh's expressive self-portrait to Rembrandt's introspective gaze to Modigliani's modernist interpretation.

title: Mixed Media
description: Experience the diversity of artistic expression! Explore 5 different art mediums: pen and wash drawing, silk evening dress, ink calligraphy, gold funerary mask, and carved wood sculpture.
galleryMap: Galleries 690, Costume Institute, 224, Rockefeller Wing, Rockefeller Wing

title: Art Essentials
description: Visit the museum's most iconic masterpieces! See Van Gogh's self-portrait, Rembrandt's introspective masterpiece, and Seurat's pointillist study that revolutionized art.

title: Color Quest
description: Experience the full spectrum of artistic color! From the golden brilliance of ancient masks to the rich blues of stained glass, discover how artists across cultures have used color to captivate and inspire.

title: Global Perspectives
description: Explore art from 4 different world regions! Journey from Japanese landscapes to Mesoamerican smiling figures, ancient Mesopotamian cuneiform to American river scenes.
